titleStmt.title: A true coppy of a bold and most peremptory letter, sent to the Honourable Earle of Salisbury, / by A. B. C. &c. To mittigate his prosecuting of recusants.
titleStmt.author: A. B. C.
Salisbury, Robert Cecil, Earl of, 1563-1612. Answere to certaine scandalous papers, scattered abroad under colour of a Catholicke admonition.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. Alsop, dwelling in Grubstreet,

notesStmt.note: The letter, addressed to Robert Cecil, Earl of Salisbury, was originally published in 1606 as part of Salisbury's "An answere to certaine scandalous papers, scattered abroad under colour of a Catholicke admonition".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
